Package: grails.views

[Groovy] Interface ViewUriResolver

  • A ViewUriResolver is response for response template and view URIs using Grails' conventions.

    Authors:
    Graeme Rocher

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        java.lang.String resolveTemplateUri(java.lang.String controllerName, java.lang.String templateName)
        Resolves a template URI for the given path

    • Method Detail

      • java.lang.String resolveTemplateUri(java.lang.String controllerName, java.lang.String templateName)

        Resolves a template URI for the given path Example: assert resolveTemplateUri('foo', 'bar') == /foo/_bar.gson

        Parameters:
        controllerName - The controller name
        path - The path to the template
        Returns:
        The template URI
